content: # Dayl App This project is a React Native hybrid application for Dayl. [//]: # (## Screenshots) [//]: # () [//]: # () ## Installation Install dayl with expo and npm ```bash npm install -g expo-cli --global npm install expo start ``` Make sure your phone is on the same wifi as the computer that is running the metro bundler and then scan the QR CODE with the [Expo Go ](https://expo.dev/client) app. ### Run on tunnel If you wish to run the app without being connected to the same wifi as your computer then you can run Expo on a remote server. #### Connect to the following server : ```bash ssh ubuntu@162.19.50.227 cd daylappreactnative git pull npm install expo start --tunnel ``` ## Color Reference | Color | Hex | | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | | DaylRed | ![#0a192f](https://via.placeholder.com/10/e9573f?text=+) #e9573f | ## Font Reference | Section | Font | | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | | Main | | ## Authors - [Leopold Tran](mailto:leopoldtran@gmail.com) - [Valentin Best](mailto:valentinbest@gmail.com)
name: ./README.md
